issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable
issues.description:
In the function '_function_0xe9874106' the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.coinbase

issues.title: Ether send
issues.description:
In the function '_function_0xe9874106' a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to an address taken from storage slot 0.
There is a check on storage index 0. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function 'fallback'.

There is a check on storage index 1. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function 'fallback'.
There is a check on storage index 1. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function 'fallback'.

issues.title: Exception state
issues.description: A reachable exception (opcode 0xfe) has been detected. This can be caused by type errors, division by zero, out-of-bounds array access, or assert violations. This is acceptable in most situations. Note however that assert() should only be used to check invariants. Use require() for regular input checking.
